values:
Hey guy's.

I need some help from ya'll dressage riders. I've asked this question a few times but i've never got an answer 8(. Well I need a dressage girth and I was wondering if anyone knew what size? Example : I have a size 48 girth thats jacked up on both sides...what size dressage girth would that be? 

I would appreciate ANY help you guy's can give me!!!!! thanks so much!!! 

<3

www.xanga.com/ox__seh__xo

go leave a comment. now.

BASIC HORSE (eats, sleeps, poops, can't be ridden, handled, etc.): $0**

2] AGE:
3 or under- Add $1000
4 or 5- Add $3000
5 to 10- Add $5000
11 to 15- Add $3000
16 to 20- Add $1000
21 to 25- Add $0
Over 25- Subtract $5,000

3] GENDER (Keep in mind, this is for hunters only):
Mare: Add $0
Stallion: Add $0
Gelding: Add $1000

4] HEIGHT:
Upper inch of pony height divisions (12.1-12.2, 13.1-13.2, 14.1-14.2): Add $3000
Upper inch of small horses (15.3 to just under 16.0hh): Add $5000
Big horse (16.3hh to 17.3hh): Add $7000
Measures well over acceptable pony height, but still has permanent measurement card: Add $5000
Measures well over acceptable small horse height, but still holds a small card: Add $7000

5] COLOR:(Note: skip this section for ponies, who are exempt from all color rules)
Bay: Add $2000
Chestnut/black: Add $1000
Grey: Add $1000 UNLESS owner takes care of own horse.
Palomino/roan: Add $0
Buckskin/pinto: Subract $1000
Appy: Subtract $2000

6] TEMPERMENT (ground):
(Note: If your contact with your horse is limited to feeding it carrots once a week after taking it, fully tacked up, from your grooms, AND you plan to keep up this system, please skip this section.)
Gentle: Add $1000
Affectionate: Add $1000
Bites: Subtract $2000
Kicks: Subtract $1000
Cribs: Subtract $2000
Heaves/other respiratory unsoundnesses: Subtract $6000

7] TEMPERMENT (riding):
Spooks at things on the ground*: Subract $3000
Spooks at fences sometimes*: Subtract $5000
Spooks at fences consistently*: Subract $10,000
Refuses*: Subract $10,000
Rears*: Subract $7000
Bucks*: Subtract $5000
Takes off*: Subtract $4000
Pulls/gets strong*: Subract $1000
Is lazy/slow off the leg: Subract $1000
Never refuses: Add $3000
COMPLETELY, UNFAILINGLY obedient (could quite possibly attempt to run off a cliff you told it to do so): Add $5000
Could probably negotiate the course alone or with minimal help: Add $7000
Difficult to ride (pulls, resists, requires someone other than a useless passenger on its back)*: Subtract $10,000
Lack of auto lead changes: Subtract $5,000
Lack of simple lead changes: Subtract $5,000
Swishes tail/pins ears while in the show ring: Subtract $2,000
*=IGNORE if you or your trainer plans to ride/show horse only on heavy 'medication'.

8] MOVEMENT:
Could win any hack, anywhere, provided the rider didn't wear the wrong color breeches or something else unavoidable: Add $10,000
Wins in modest company, places in good company: Add $5,000
Appears to be sound and could possibly even win a hack if all other horses were dead lame or wearing unfashionable apparel: Add $0
Trots lame: Subtract $5,000 unless only planning to show in divisions that don't require a jog and that can be won without a hack class.

9] JUMPING ABILITY (Horses only): (Note: Choosing a particular height implies that the horse can jump a show COURSE at this height, without knocking over poles or requiring perfect distances to every jump. Basically, if the horse can chip/go long to a certain fence height, THAT is the level.
catherine says:
Basically, if the horse can chip/go long to a certain fence height, THAT is the level. If your horse can sometimes make it over 3'6", but will run out if not set up perfectly, then it cannot show at that level and should move down. Also, this means that the horse can SAFELY do this.)

Jumps 2'3": Add $1,000
Jumps 2'6": Add $1,000
Jumps 3': Add $6,000
Jumps 3'3": Add $9,000
Jumps 3'6": Add $15,000
Jumps 4': Add $25,000
Jumps over 4': Move to jumper divisions immediately.

10] JUMPING STYLE:
Rox Dene-esque: Add $20,000
Fancy enough to win most places: Add $15,000
Always in the ribbons: Add $10,000
Usually places: Add $5,000
Sometimes places: Add $3,000
Errr...well, it jumps: Add $0
Flips over poles/runs into jumps/causes children to ask their parents "Was that SUPPOSED to happened?"/jump crew's worst nightmare: Subtract $5,000

11] STRIDING:
Subtract $5,000 if it cannot make the strides.

12] PRETTINESS (applies only to horses--all ponies are naturally adorable):
Jaw-dropping gorgeous (and NOT just to you!): Add $6,000
Absolutely adorable: Add $4,000
Handsome: Add $3,000
Attractive/passable: Add $2,000
Average: Add $0
Ugly/misshapen: Subtract $2,000

13] CONFORMATION:
Perfect: Add $5,000
Good: Add $3,000
OK: Add $0
Bad: Subtract $2,000

14] WEIGHT:
Overweight: Subtract $1,000
Underweight: Subtract $3,000

15] SHOW EXPERIENCE:
Never shown: Subtract $5,000
Lightly, successfully shown: Add $2,000
Extensively, semi-successfully shown ("c", "B", some "A" shows, many ribbons, few championships): Add $5,000
WON at "B" shows: Add $7,000
WON at "A" shows: Add $10,000

16] SOUNDNESS:
Never taken a lame step in its life/doesn't colic, etc.: Add $5,000
Minor health problems (abcessed once, etc.): Add $1,000                                                                                                                                                                              Larger health problems (bad splints, sore back, etc.): Subtract $5,000
Big health issues (bone chip, colics frequently, was off for a few months, etc.): Subtract $7,000

17] FAME:
At Big Name Barn: Add $6,000
Ridden by/owned by/marketed by BNT: Add $10,000
Won at Big Name Shows, giving the horse a MAJOR name-recognition advantage: Add $10,000

18]OTHER STUFF:
Warmblood: Add $5,000
Off the track: Subtract $5,000
If this is your own horse and you know that you are prone to exaggerating how pretty/fancy/scopy/gentle your baby is, subtract around $10,000.**(NO FAIR)

MY HORSE IS WORTH: $32,000

 

he doesnt do hunters, so this crap has nothing to do with him lol .. but o well

hahahaha i love my to-be cousin!!!!! shes FUNNY!!

Well, see, my parents had to take my uncle somewhere cuz hes on crack. Terra came over. We watched The Horse Wisperer. Melissa came over in the middle of it. So we watched it. When that girl was kissin that guy. Terra was like "SHE IS MARRIED!!" all i heard after that was "shes MARRIED!!" haha, funny to me. so then we fed the horses. 

We came back & talked about school & my uncle & stuff like that. Then i felt like watchin a movie. So we watched Hide & Seek. WHICH IS A FLIPPIN HORROR MOVIE. Well, Terra didn't seem to be to scared @ first. Then we both got into it. hehe. We were tryin to figure out who Charlie was & stuff. We were figurin it out & stuff & well this guy was basically phyco. He was a phycoligist (people who sit down & listen to other peoples problems & try to help them ya know). Well, she was like "he needs a phycoligist" i was like "he IS one" & she was like "well, he needs a diff. one cuz he aint workin"

I busted out laughin IN THE MIDDLE OF A HORROR MOVIE!! Then sam came & scared the sh!t outta us. So, we were freaked so we watched With Out A Paddle so we wouldnt be so scared. Then we played around with some cards & they left @ 1:30. FUN FUN.

Well, its late & i just thought i would update about my night.

<3 ya

Well I have like nothing to update right now. So0o0 im gonna go! buh bye!

hEy hEy guys!

Well, if you haven't looked @ the pics from Bristol ... go look now lol.

Well, im like really bored. I woke up @ like 12:30 then I just kinda layed around till a few minutes ago when I went & took a shower. My life is boring. I mean, when im with fry, its VERY random, so its fun. But now ... its boring & predictable. Nothing ever happens! I need something exciting to happen ... I feel like im wasting my life away in front of my computer. Ugh.

fry made me cry =(. She sent me an e-mail that made me laugh histarically, but @ the end, I had tears in my eyes. I guess i'll show ya'll ...

i love you Hopmie!!!!
i love everything about you:
1. the way you can make me laff by doing absolutley NOTHING...example- breathing.
2. your ability to be scared.... five seconds later than we say boo.
3. your lovely loveableness.
4. the fact that you put a bit in your mouth, maybe next time i could get a saddle on you?
5. tha fact that we can laff about NOTHING and put it in the book, and then laff about it later because we are laffing at NOTHING!!!
6. your ability to drop me on my FACE
7.how you break out in DANCE and theres NO music
8. how you break out into a DIFFERENT song than the one thats on the radio or CMT.
9.EVERYTHING about you... except the fact that you jump off when a horse is being bad, but thats another story,and that the ONLY thing.
 
 
I LOVE YOU HOPMIE!*!*!*!*!*!*!
 
 
I cryed for that =(, thats how much I love her!! & heres what I replyed ..
 
 
 
fry, i love you so much! thatmade me laugh histarictly/cry.
 
i love you my fry!!
1. the way you always hit my nose, even if your aiming for my leg.
2.you can make me laugh by saying the word pumba. (bubbles too, but everybody can make me laugh by saying that. pumba is JUST you)
3. our telepathic ways. how we can just LOOK @ eachother & laugh becuase we know what eachother is thinking. 
4. the way you fall =)
5. the way a simple thing such as a bug can entertain us.
6. being with you is a good thing. if you want to get ab's or a few bruises from trying the dance from white chicks when you go home.
7. ANYTHING & EVERYTHING we have done in the last 2 years together.
8.I know that NOBODY has a friend like you, & that im VERY LUCKY to have a friend like you. & no matter what
anyone else thinks, youll always be my friend ..
I HEART YOU FRY!!
 
 
 
Dang, I love her =). Shes offically my first true love. & I wish she could see this so bad.
 
Well. Its boring here & a thunderstorm outside. So im going to go undulge(sp) myself in magazines.
 
x3 yall! __sara*elizabeth

HeY hEy ya'll

I had a lesson today. So, we get there & Pongos out w/ Spencer again. We have to drive to the other barn & get Danni. We get Misty in first then go & get Pongo & Spencer. Spencer is CRAZY AS HELL! He's suppose to be a freakin olympic horse. HUH. He doesn't look or act it.

So after we get them in.  THE TACK ROOM IS LOCKED. So, Jennifer & Danni go to the other barn to get the key. Come back & say IM suppose to have one. WE NEVER GOT A key. WTF. Im pissed off now. So I finally get tacked up. & we head over to the barn.

We did really weird courses lol. Like, i'd have to jump one jump, then make an S & jump another. Weird.
Wernor said were lookin good!! Which, means we ARE REALLY lookin good. Hes an OLYMPIAN. AHH. Oh well, Pongo hates him. hehe.
Hes learning how not to look like a giraffe!!! Im so proud of my little pingo! [or pango as Jennifer accidently called him hehe]

Haley just doesn't know when to quit. I SWARE. SHE JUST DOESN'T KNOW WHAT NO MEANS. SHES DRIVING ME CRAZY! Shes acting like a 5 y/o. Her sister says **WE** need to act our age. More like **SHE** needs to act her age. Shes freakin older than me. 

Oh well. Not all things in like can be perfect.

x3__sara*elizabeth__

Life is good. Pongo is good. Guys are awesome haha. Horses are awesome. Bubbles are now officially cooler than squirrels. Food is good hehe. Friends ROCK. Life sucks. People suck. School sucks. Selling my baby sucks. Tex being lame sucks. Helping to get a CRAZY ASS horse in sucks. Weel, not much of an update eh? Well today I went to ride Pongo. Didn't happen. The tack room was locked & Danni didn't have the key. So, I went & lunged him alittle. Then came back. Then I had to help Danni get Spencer(the crazy ass olympic horse) in from his turnout. Well im gonna go. Haley just doesn't know when to quit. Jon is coming back. Drew told me like yesterday. Ugh, I need to add Haley sucks to the above list. ♥ __sara*elizabeth__x3

I feel so sorry for the people already in school. School sucks. Ugh, I guess we'll get use to it. Getting up @ 6:00. Dragging yourself outta bed. Getting ready. Then dragging yourself & the weight of that bookbag filled w// everything, ALL that long way to the car. Then driving for 5 whole minutes to the bus. Gettin on the stupidest bus in the whole world that has shocks that shake so much, they could make chocalate milk. Driving 30 min. Waiting FOREVER. Then going to class, where, you'll talk, not learn anything, then its off to the next class, where, youll talk & not learn anything, & so on & so on. Until you get to lunch. Where, youll talk & eat. I guess its the best time to socialize, as you dont have to whisper or txt message to talk to people. Its also a fun time to SPIT DR PEPPER ON PEOPLE!! +cough cough+ MALLORY!! lol j/k ... ok back to school ... where after lunch, youll drag yourself to class, && talk some more, then theres PE. Where youll run around in a stupid circle & get accussed of flicking people off. Then, youll go inside & get BACK on the stupidest bus. Go home, work SOME MORE. Then, have fun, that is, if there is time!! 

People suck. School sucks. Dr Pepper sucks. Running sucks. I think just about EVERYTHING sucks. Oh well. Only 180 days of school. 

Well, its off to bed for me. Where ill sleep. Then wake up. Then, have some fun =), atleast ill try. Only 11 days till school starts. 

TTYL GUYS!!!

♥ yall!

HAHAHA I have found the best song ever!! & Possibly the funniest haha ...
For those of you that aren't the biggest fan of country, heres the regular lyrics ::

 

The devil went down to Georgia, he was lookin' for a soul to steal.
He was in a bind 'cuz he was way behind and he was willin' to make a deal.
When he came accross this young man sawin' on a fiddle and playin' it hot.
And the devil jumped up on a hickory stump and said, "Boy, let me tell you what."
I guess you didn't know it, but I'm a fiddle player, too.
And if you care to take a dare, I'll make a bet with you.
Now, you play a pretty good fiddle, boy, but give the devil his due.
I'll bet a fiddle of gold against your soul, 'cuz I think I'm better than you.
The boy said, "My name's Johhny" and it might be a sin
but I'll take your bet; you're gonna regret, 'cause I'm the best that's ever been.

Johhny, rosin up your bow and play your fiddle hard,
'Cause Hell's broke loose in Georgia, and the devil deals the cards.
And if you win, you'll get this shiny fiddle made of gold,
but if you lose, the devil gets your soul...

The devil opened up his case and he said I'll start this show.
And fire blew from his fingertips as he rosined up his bow.
And he pulled the bow accross the strings and it made an evil hiss.
Then a band of demons joined in and it sounded something like this...

When the devil finished Johnny said Well, you're pretty good, ol' son,
but sit down in that chair right there, and let me show you how it's done.

Fire on the mountain run, boys, run
The devil's in the house of the risin' sun
Chicken in the bread pan, pickin' out dough
Granny, does your dog bite? No, child, no

The devil bowed his head because he knew that he'd beat.
And he laid that golden fiddle on the ground by Johhny's feet.
And Johhny said, devil, just come on back if you ever wanna try again.
I done told you once, you son of a bitch, I'm the best that's ever been.
He played....

Fire on the mountain run, boys, run
The devil's in the house of the risin' sun
Chicken in the bread pan, pickin' out dough
Granny, will your dog bite? No, child, no

Now for the best remix of this song ever hahaha ...

The Devil went to Jamaica
He was lookin' to sell some weed
He was doin' fine
They were standin' in line
It was excellent weed indeed
When he came across this young man
Who was likewise peddlin' pot
And the Deil slid
Down the beach to the kid
And said,"Boy, lemme tell you what.

"I guess you kinda figured
I'm a reeferhead, of course
And after all that time
I guess that I'm
A connoisseur of sorts
Now your stuff smells OK
But this could tranquilize a horse
I'll bet a million in cash
Against your stash
'Cause I think mine's better than yours."

The boy said, "My name's Johnny
And you ain't smoked nothin' yet.
One hit of this grass'll
Kick your ass
You got yourself a bet."

Johnny, roll a ball of hash
And make sure it's the bomb
'Cause the Devil's got
The kind of stuff
They smoked in Vietnam
And you'll get a million smackeroos
In cash if you can cope
But if you can't
The Devil gets your dope.

The Devil packed a bong with
A little Acapulco Gold
And resin flew from
His fingertips as
He fired up his bowl
He filled the chamber all the way
And he took a mighty hit
And as they passed it
Back and forth
It gave 'em both a coughing fit

When the bowl was finished
Johnny said, "Hey man
That stuff was great!
But fill your lungs
With some of this and
Prepare to vegetate!"

Cannabis sativa, sweet mary jane
The Devil's in the backyard fryin' his brain
Zig-Zag filled the diggity dank
Hold on tight, it'll hit you like a tank

The devil nodded off because
He knew that he was stoned
And he asked if he
Could buy an ounce
Of the stuff that Johnny owned
Johnny said, "Devil,
Just come on back i you ever
Wanna catch a buzz
I done told you once, you sunnuvabitch,
Mine's the best that ever was!"

And they
Fired up doobies one by one
Ain't a-gonna stop 'til the bag is done
Green as a bullfrog, sticky as glue
Granny do you get high; yes I do

HeY homies! what be up?
lol im H-Y-P-E-R!!!! can you believe its already AUGUST!! WOW ... i still remember new years ... it was so much fun! I went over to heathers & they had a bonfire ... Annas friends came over too. we played a TV game thingy lol then Melinda got this book & started makin it into a play lol ... it was so much fun.

Im like so bored! I havent been this bored since ... last night lol

OMG!!! I almost got my leg crushed today!! I feel so effin lucky ... i dont even know how i got my leg out from under him .. well see i was about to canter up this hill, && it was muddy, & cowboy slipped && fell on his SIDE!! i rolled up the hill as fast as i could so i wouldnt get hurt. but i still dont know ... it was like slow motion, @ first i though it was a stumble, then, I saw his neck go down & his hind end go down. next thing i know, im rollin up the hill. idk i guess i just feel lucky.

Well, we start school in 12 days. I mean, im happy about seein all my friends & stuff, but HOMEWORK SUCKS!! But ya'll already knew that lol. 

I think im gonna change my icon ... maybe my layout ... lol i get tired of stuff really easily lol ... well ... i guess i better go! 


♥ ya'll

HeY hEy

Im back from tha races!! They were fun even though they got rained out after the 1rst round ...

Ok so ... we left ... got there && unloaded, Averie rode w// us ... but i just mostly read the whole way ... so I showed her around alittle && stuff. When we got back slug was over there so me && her just went to roberts trailer w// them. Calvin && Kline were over there fer alittle bit ... then we just kinda sat around bein boreddd. JOSH FREAKIN LIKES ME!!! Gosh ... its like 2 guys now that like me ... 
But anyway, hes cool, unfortunatly hes gonna be my cousin .. in like march or somethin. idk

So I did my first time run which didnt take long ... got back && like didnt do nuthin ... I think we walked around && stuff but idk ... so like alot of people came over to our trailer ... like ... alot. but hey it was cool. HAHAHA kandy && justin got into it man!! i mean kandy basically cussed him freakin out!! she so won lol ... Sam won first round YAY ... i lost to kline, i was like TEN off ... its probably cuz they screwed w// my clutch && stuff but w/e ... 

So a while later me && averie got bored && we were gonna go walkin so we start && like here comes everybody .. so we stayed out in the rain w// everybody. hahaha calvin fell over backwards on a tiny little bity fourwheeler ... && everybody REALLY liked averies big sunglasses lol...so it was fun ... so then i went back && sat on sams lap && bothered him, hehe it was fun till he tickled me :( haha ... then he said i wanted to ride home w// them just to flirt w// josh .. i was like NO && i hit him lol, so then we were gettin ready to leave, && he told terra, && i was like, && i hit you didnt I && he said "no accually you agreed" I took after him so freakin fast lol. i chased him until i heard pickin wildflowers ... then he basically begged to be chased so i was like "do you want diet coke on your head??" so i chased him ya know ... && we jus kinda talked on tha way home ... so now im here ... really tired so im gonna go ... 


♥ ♥ &hearts LiBbY

ok ... so maybe i did kinda get hurt when i feel off :/ ... my ankle hurts && its kinda swollen so i have some ice on it .... lol i dont care though, it was the best freakin fall i ever had!!!!! YAY!!! hmmm cuz im bored to death i guess ill try && remember all my falls

FALL #1 :::
This fall broke my confidence FOREVER, I quit riding @ the time becuase i got so scared. 
Sugar, Melissa's pony, took off w// me && i started to fall so i jumped off && didnt roll. That time I thought 'OMG if one pony does it, there all gonna do it' so im still kinda weirry about riding new horses.

FALL #2 :::
I think this fall was when I was bareback on Montana && he bucked me off && i landed on my tail bone ... on gravel ... not fun 

FALL #3 :::
Being bucked off yet again by Montana. He got fed up w// the dogs so he decided to buck.

FALL #4 :::
Ummmm I was riding down the drive way, Montana got spooked, galloped off I swung my leg around but my other foot didnt come out haha so I was hanging on the side of him .. kinda fun lol 

FALL #5 :::
Jumped off Heathers horse bud becuase he cantered off w// me w// out a bridle or saddle ... scarey ... landed under a SUGAR GUM TREE!!! OOOWWWEEE!!!!!! PAIN!!!!!

FALL #6 :::
I was riding w// Heather, I asked Montana to canter, he didnt lke it, he bucked, I jumped, landed on the ground pretty hard lol

FALL #7 :::
I WAS A STUPID IDIOT!!
I didnt tighten my girth && I galloped on the trail, @ the final turn, the saddle slipped && fell on top of me ... I think this fall made my hip worse, ugh, not fun now. Now, my hip pops even when i laugh ... its bad .. i hate it ...

FALL #8
TODAY!!!!!!!!!
HAHA yall know the details .. this fall hurt my knees ( i dont have very good knees so the impact made them worse), my back (ooowwweeee it hurts!!!), my wrist, my ankle, && my rib .... it was fun though TEEHEHEHE!!




So yes, riding has caused some aches && pains, && some problems (like making my hip worse, ouch) or making my knees ache everyday. But i still love it!!! 

So i gots me a new layout!!! Lettme know if ya like it!!

I had an awesome fall today! lol ... it was the best fall ive ever had lol ... 
See, when I ride, I have to basically school on trails, well, theres a turn off my dad made as a short cut to the barn. Me & cowboy were galloping down the main trail, when, @ the last SECOND he decides "Mom, I dont really think i wanna go ALL the way around this trail, lets just go HERE" WOW, WHAT A SHOCK! I wasnt expecting him to take that turn! Atleast not that sharp! Well, I tryed to grab mane, but it didn't help AT ALL. I literally FLEW off && slammed into some pine trees. I think i rolled, && it accually didnt hurt @ all. I did hit my head, but it doesnt hurt. I do wish i had a helmet here though, were going to get one from SLT as soon as we can. Im so glad i have a hard head lol. It was accualy fun ow that i think of it. He didnt run away, he just lingured(sp) off, && stopped when the reins got tangled on his leg, so, I got back on && rode home. Now, my rib hurts. I guess i just probably bruised it. But thats happend before when i got shot gunned really hard w// a softball that NEIL punted. WHY DOES HE HAVE TO BE SUCH GOOD A PLAYER?!?!

Haley is being such a little bitch!! She like won't leave me alone, && sayin I just want to start a fight. SURE w/e. If anyone wants to start a fight, its her. She has an IQ of ike 35. 

OOO GUESS WHAT!! hehe i found me some cowboy boots that fit!! lol they were free too cuz i found them on the porch .... 

Im SOOOO bored!! Saturdays a race!!! YAY!! Heather cant come :( shes goin to Parkers ... shes gotta meet tha new band director dude guy or whatever lol. 

Well I guess this post is like long enough. ♥ ♥ ♥

<3 ya! LiBbY
